text: The Oxfordshire Gold Cup was a greyhound racing competition held at Oxford Stadium until the stadium closed in 2012. The competition was inaugurated in 1985 and introduced by Mick Wheble. It was won three times in succession by Jolly Poacher. ==Past winners== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |+ |- !width=50|Year !width=180|Winner !width=270|Breeding !width=250|Trainer !width=80|Time !width=50|SP !width=100|Notes |- !1985 | Nippy Law || Lax Law -
